channel.title: Adding Award To SMF Forums FTP Client
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][b]-[u]How To Add Awards To SMF Forums FTP Client[/u]-[/b][/size][/center]
[b]Knowledge[/b]:How To Click things and Type. [b]Difficulty[/b]:1/10 [b]Credits[/b]:100% Me
[b]Step 1[/b] First Open up Smart FTP Client, you should see this. [IMG]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa241/jonthemod55/FTPClientopened.png[/img]
[b]Step 2[/b] Now go into the folder you have your forum files installed in for example mine is called forums. [IMG]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa241/jonthemod55/forumfolder-1.png[/img]
[b]Step 3[/b] Now go into the theme folder. [IMG]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa241/jonthemod55/themesfolder-1.png[/img]
[b]Step 4[/b] Now go to a theme you want to have awards which is probably the one your forum is using at the moment, for example i will go into the default theme. [IMG]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa241/jonthemod55/defaultthemefolder-1.png[/img]
[b]Step 5[/b] Now go into the images folder. [IMG]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa241/jonthemod55/imagesfolder-1.png[/img]
[b]Step 6[/b] Now upload the images by right clicking and going to upload then direct then select. [IMG]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa241/jonthemod55/upload.png[/img]
[b]Step 7[/b] Now click add files and choose the image you want to upload. [IMG]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa241/jonthemod55/imageupload.png[/img]
[b]Step 8[/b] Now add membergroup you want and put the upload file name .png or whatever the type of file your image was uploaded as and you have awards added. [IMG]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa241/jonthemod55/awardadded.png[/img]
Hope this helped enjoy.
Signed, The Angel Of Death

item.title: Adding Award To SMF Forums FTP Client
item.dc:creator: @the_angel_of_death the angel of death
item.description:
@the_angel_of_death wrote:

[center][size=14pt]-How To Add Awards To SMF Forums FTP Client-[/size][/center]

Knowledge:How To Click things and Type.
Difficulty:1/10
Credits:100% Me

Step 1
First Open up Smart FTP Client, you should see this.

FTPClientopened.png1024×768

Step 2
Now go into the folder you have your forum files installed in for example mine is called forums.

forumfolder-1.png1024×768

Step 3
Now go into the theme folder.

themesfolder-1.png1024×768

Step 4
Now go to a theme you want to have awards which is probably the one your forum is using at the moment, for example i will go into the default theme.

defaultthemefolder-1.png1024×768

Step 5
Now go into the images folder.

imagesfolder-1.png1024×768

Step 6
Now upload the images by right clicking and going to upload then direct then select.

upload.png1024×768

Step 7
Now click add files and choose the image you want to upload.

imageupload.png1024×768

Step 8
Now add membergroup you want and put the upload file name .png or whatever the type of file your image was uploaded as and you have awards added.

awardadded.png1024×768

Hope this helped enjoy.

Signed,
The Angel Of Death

Read full topic
